message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this fantastic product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I'm looking to stay within my budget. Would you consider selling it to me for $100?
Hi Bob, I understand that you're looking to stay within your budget, but I have to make a profit. I can do a bit better than $100, but I'm not willing to go as low as $100. How about $110?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm still looking to keep my expenses within my budget. Could you consider offering the product at $95?
Hi Bob, I can see you're really interested in the product, but I need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to get at least $105 for the product. How about we meet at $105?
Hello Alice, I'm glad we're able to continue our discussion. I'm still aiming to keep my expenses within my budget. Could you consider offering the product at $100?
